input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Timex"
Reference Product Name: "Expedition Scout"
Reference Product Description:
The Expedition Titanium is ready to go the distance, living up to the Timex legacy of fully equipping you for your adventures ahead while embodying the kind of tradition you can wear every day. Its key feature is its shock-resistant 38mm case rendered in true titanium, offering incredible durability while ensuring a comfortably lightweight feel on the wrist. Reinforcing its 200m water resistance are a screw-down crown and screw-on caseback that effectively keep water out, while the light gray dial features a date window at 3 o'clock and luminescent hands and hour markers for enhanced visibility in lowlight conditions. Clean and modern, itâ€™s powered by a reliable quartz movement and features a sapphire crystal for optimal clarity, a sturdy crown protector, and a smooth grain Italian leather strap ethically sourced from and gold-rated by the Leather Working Group (LWG) and complete with contrast side stitches.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='SRPJ45 Seiko Men's 5 Sports'
  - Name='Orient Mens Watch TAC00009'
  - Name='Tissot Men's T-Sport Chronograph Quartz Watch'
  - Name='Bulova Men's Chronograph Quartz Watch with Black Silicone Strap'
  - Name='Fossil Men's Townsman Automatic Stainless Steel Watch'
  - Name='Seiko Men's 5 Sports SRPD51 Automatic Watch'
  - Name='Timex Men's Waterbury Metropolitan Automatic Leather Strap Watch'
  - Name='Fossil Mens Bannon Watch'
  - Name='Citizen Men's PCAT Watch CB5880-54L'
  - Name='Seiko 5 Sports Field Series Automatic Watch'
  - Name='Citizen Men's BX1003-08E Eco Drive World Time Perpetual Calendar'
  - Name='Citizen Men's Eco-Drive Promaster Watch'
  - Name='Men's Orient Revival World Map RA-AA0E01S19B'
  - Name='Casio Pro-Trek Men's Solar Ana-Digital Watch'
  - Name='Casio - PRG-601PE-5ER - Armbanduhr - Funkuhr - Solar - Herren - Pro Trek'
  - Name='Skagen Men's Titanium Watch with Mineral Crystal'
  - Name='Timex Mk1 x Fortnite Quartz Black Dial Watch TW2W97000 Men's'
  - Name='Timex Men's Collegiate Easy Reader Watch with Leather Strap'
  - Name='Seiko Men's 5 Sports Automatic GMT Watch'
  - Name='Seiko Men's 5 Sports SRPG39 Watch'
  - Name='Seiko Men's SRPG41 5 Sports Watch'
  - Name='CASIO Men's Watch'
  - Name='Seiko Men's 5 Sports SSK017 Automatic GMT Watch'
  - Name='Seiko Men's 5 Sports Automatic GMT'
  - Name='Casio Analog Digital Combination Dial Quartz Watch AMW870A-2AV Men's'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: SRPJ45 Seiko Men's 5 Sports
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A durable, sports-style men's watch with automatic movement; similar rugged field watch style but automatic vs quartz and no titanium case noted.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Orient Mens Watch TAC00009
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A men's watch likely with durable features; Orient is comparable to Timex but no specific titanium or high-end features described.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Tissot Men's T-Sport Chronograph Quartz Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Quartz chronograph sport watch similar to Timex's quartz and sport use; likely heavier case and more complex dial but similar purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bulova Men's Chronograph Quartz Watch with Black Silicone Strap
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Quartz chronograph with sport strap, similar quartz movement but silicone strap and chronograph function differ from leather strap and simpler dial.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil Men's Townsman Automatic Stainless Steel Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Automatic movement and stainless steel case differ from Timex's quartz and titanium case; likely dressier style somewhat less rugged.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Seiko Men's 5 Sports SRPD51 Automatic Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Automatic sports watch from Seiko's 5 Sports line, comparable rugged field watch style but lacks titanium build, also automatic vs quartz.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Timex Men's Waterbury Metropolitan Automatic Leather Strap Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Timex brand, leather strap, automatic movement; Waterbury line less rugged but still a comparable field-style watch; no titanium however.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil Mens Bannon Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fossil Bannon likely a fashion watch, probably stainless steel not titanium and automatic or quartz; less rugged and durable focus.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Men's PCAT Watch CB5880-54L
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Citizen PCAT models often with advanced features, quartz, durable construction; similar focus on ruggedness but different brand and materials.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Seiko 5 Sports Field Series Automatic Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Field watch automatic similar in style and intended use; not titanium but rugged and reliable sport watch like Timex Expedition.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Men's BX1003-08E Eco Drive World Time Perpetual Calendar
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Advanced quartz eco-drive with multiple functions, less minimalistic field watch style; heavier emphasis on features over simple ruggedness.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Men's Eco-Drive Promaster Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Rugged, durable Eco-Drive sport watch, similar outdoor focus and quartz movement but likely heavier case materials.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Orient Revival World Map RA-AA0E01S19B
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Orient Revival line is more vintage aesthetic; less focus on rugged titanium case or extreme water resistance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Casio Pro-Trek Men's Solar Ana-Digital Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Highly durable outdoor-focused watch with analog-digital display, solar power; similar rugged use but different construction and tech.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Casio - PRG-601PE-5ER - Armbanduhr - Funkuhr - Solar - Herren - Pro Trek
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pro Trek durable outdoor watch with solar and atomic timekeeping, robust construction, ideal for adventurers but different materials and functions.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Skagen Men's Titanium Watch with Mineral Crystal
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Titanium case matches reference's lightweight durable material but Skagen tends to be more minimalist dress watch, less rugged.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Timex Mk1 x Fortnite Quartz Black Dial Watch TW2W97000 Men's
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and quartz, possibly light and casual, but likely not as rugged or titanium made as reference model.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Timex Men's Collegiate Easy Reader Watch with Leather Strap
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Leather strap and Timex brand but likely simpler dress watch style, less durable and no titanium or high water resistance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Seiko Men's 5 Sports Automatic GMT Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Sports watch with automatic and GMT functions; robust but lacks titanium and is automatic versus quartz, still similar use case.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Seiko Men's 5 Sports SRPG39 Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Rugged sports automatic watch similar functionally as a field-style watch, no titanium. Comparable durability focus.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Seiko Men's SRPG41 5 Sports Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same rationale as other Seiko 5 Sports automatics: field/sports oriented, durable but different power source and materials.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CASIO Men's Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Generic Casio men's watch likely quartz and durable but no details on materials or outdoor focus; too generic.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Seiko Men's 5 Sports SSK017 Automatic GMT Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Sporty automatic GMT watch comparable in rugged use, lacks titanium and quartz exact match but shares outdoor watch qualities.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Seiko Men's 5 Sports Automatic GMT
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same as above: rugged automatic field/sport watch, similar target use but no titanium and different movement.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Casio Analog Digital Combination Dial Quartz Watch AMW870A-2AV Men's
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Quartz with analog-digital dial, rugged sporty watch suitable for outdoor use, but different design focus and materials.
